root.name: ARGO Online
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP (32bit) / Vista (32bit) / 7 (32/64bit)CPU: Intel Core2 Duo (Core i5)RAM: 512 MBHDD: 5 GB FreeGraphics Card: Nvidia GeForce 8 series / ATI(AMD) Radeon HD 2xxx seriesRecommendedOS: Windows XP (32bit) / Vista (32bit) / 7 (32/64bit)CPU: Intel Core2 Duo or higher (Core i7/ AMD Athlon II (Phenom II) X4)RAM: 1 GB or moreHDD: 6 GB Free or moreGraphics Card: Nvidia GeForce 9 (GeForce 200) series or higher / ATI (AMD) Radeon HD 3xxx seriesor higher
